title: LF team so I can stop solo Q & climb ranks! main top
body: Currently looking for a team to play with as I'm sick of solo q & sore losers throwing games on purpose.. Just want to climb ranks, I main top but can play sup/mid/jg well HMU

replies.body: Hey man, I can JG, ADC or TOP fairly well and know my champs.
yeah  i feel ya pain...add me im adc or top and play regular, nearly every night

add me im keen
im silver 5 though...
